title: Provincial Union XV v British & Irish Lions
description: The opening match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees a Provincial Union XV host the tourists at the Toll Stadium, Whangarei.

title: Blues v British & Irish Lions
description: The second match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Blues host the tourists at Eden Park.

title: Crusaders v British & Irish Lions
description: The third match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Crusaders host the tourists at the AMI Stadium, Christchurch.

title: Highlanders v British & Irish Lions
description: The fourth match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Highlanders host the tourists at the Forsyth Barr Stadium, Dunedin.

title: Maori All Blacks v British & Irish Lions
description: The fifth match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Maori All Blacks host the tourists at the Rotorua International Stadium, Rotorua.

title: Chiefs v British & Irish Lions
description: The sixth match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Chiefs host the tourists at the FMG Stadium Waikato, Hamilton.

title: New Zealand v British & Irish Lions
description: The first test of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour of New Zealand takes place on 24th June at Eden Park, Auckland.

title: Hurricanes v British & Irish Lions
description: The eighth match of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour to New Zealand sees the Hurricanes host the tourists at the Westpac Stadium, Wellington.

title: New Zealand v British & Irish Lions
description: The second test of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour of New Zealand takes place on Saturday 1st July at the Westpac Stadium, Wellington.

title: New Zealand v British & Irish Lions
description: The third test of the 2017 British & Irish Lions Tour of New Zealand takes place on 8th July at Eden Park, Auckland.
